sentences.en: We will have the happiness while we may, and change again before any come to molest.
sentences.cn: 趁现在还来得及，我们先过过瘾，在有人来干涉我们之前再换回来。

sentences.en: When it gets near it will jump and molest you !
sentences.cn: 什麽时候它得到接近的它将跳和干扰你！

sentences.en: We did not molest the big dog because we were afraid of him.
sentences.cn: 由于我们害怕那条大狗，所以我们不敢骚扰它。
